title: The privileges of the University of Oxford in point of visitation cleerly evidenced by letter to an honourable personage : together with the university's answer to the summons of the visitors.
author: Fell, John, 1625-1686.
notes: Authorship of this work has been claimed by Robert Waring and variously attributed to John Fell, Richard Allestree and Gerard Langbaine -- cf. Madan, Falconer.  Oxford books, v. 2, p. 459.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
